column1: Mrs. Carroll's remains will lie in state on Monday
column3: 2015 from 1:00 pm until 6:00 pm at Small's Mortuary
column4: Fairhope. Visitation will be held on Tuesday

column9: AL. Interment will immediately follow in the Mutual Aid Cemetery
